title: Linq To SQL GUI for like in .net
body: The implementation of the SQL Compact was a pretty steap learning curve for me as i was used to the .net GUI Implementation that made it very easy to use. I think there needs to be more focus on making it easier and quicker to implement these plumbing features as a lot of developers will be hobbyist and do not contain the time and knowledge required to implement of lot of these plumbing features. Please make it quick and simple for us to get our ideas out there. Detailed customization should be an after thought for us

comments.body: Yeah its horrible that you need to learn that code. Its just another thorn preventing you from getting your app out there
I wound up using Sterling because the Linq To SQL mapping mechanism is clearly meant to be generated from a design tool rather than used directly.
